name: Exemplar

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally C. RATE in the Arena by 27%.

skills.name: High Stance
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Pincer Attack
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Capture
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn and a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
